meanings.definition: The state or quality of being rare.
meanings.sent1: The rarenesses of the gemstones made them highly sought after.
meanings.sent2: The rarenesses of her talent were evident to all who saw her perform.
meanings.sent3: The rarenesses of finding a four-leaf clover amused the children at the park.
meanings.sent4: The rarenesses of her kindness shone like a beacon in the community.
meanings.sent5: The rarenesses of the comet's appearance made it a once-in-a-lifetime event.

meanings.definition: The condition of being uncommon or infrequent.
meanings.sent1: The rarenesses of snow in the desert surprised the travelers.
meanings.sent2: The rarenesses of his visits made his friends miss him even more.
meanings.sent3: The rarenesses of a cat enjoying a swim in the pool would be quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The rarenesses of her laughter in the quiet room echoed like music.
meanings.sent5: The rarenesses of shooting stars streaking across the sky captivated the audience.
